title: Chat restricted for almost 300 games
body:
I've completely reformed, and I am getting 1-3 honors per match, teammate and/or enemy. For some reason, my chat restriction counter seems to be going down by fives. I'm down to 160 now, and I hadn't played for almost a month before yesterday. 

EDIT: On a side note, why can I not leave this custom match? It's just me and bots. I quit the game, and it gave me a reconnect button. I closed the client, logged back in, and still get the reconnect button. Riot, pls.
